mapper.select: SELECT t.ID, t.TITLE, t.STATUS_TASK, t.CREATED_DATE, t.START_DATE, t.DUE_DATE, t.CLOSE_DATE FROM TASK t INNER JOIN USER u ON t.USER_ID = u.ID WHERE t.USER_ID = #{userId} AND t.STATUS = 'ACTIVE' AND ( (t.START_DATE IS NULL AND ((t.CREATED_DATE >= #{prevMonth} AND t.CREATED_DATE <= #{nextMonth}) OR (t.DUE_DATE >= #{prevMonth} AND t.DUE_DATE <= #{nextMonth})) ) OR (t.START_DATE IS NOT NULL AND (( CASE WHEN t.STATUS_TASK != 'CLOSED' THEN t.DUE_DATE WHEN t.STATUS_TASK = 'CLOSED' THEN t.CLOSE_DATE END >= #{prevMonth} AND CASE WHEN t.STATUS_TASK != 'CLOSED' THEN t.DUE_DATE WHEN t.STATUS_TASK = 'CLOSED' THEN t.CLOSE_DATE END <= #{nextMonth}) OR (t.START_DATE >= #{prevMonth} AND t.START_DATE <= #{nextMonth}) )) );
